channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15120] Backport HBASE-14883 to branch-1.1
item.description: When checking branch-1.1 UT in HBASE-13590, found TestSplitTransactionOnCluster#testFailedSplit will fail at a 12/50 chance. The issue is fixed by HBASE-14883 but the change didn't go into branch-1.1

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: A straight forward patch
Submit for HadoopQA

-1 overall

Checking the report, the UT failure is introduced by HBASE-15031 and have filed HBASE-15150 to fix it. The javadoc and findbugs issues are irrelative to the changes here.
